question: Which of the following does not form a part of the directives outside Part IV of the Constitution of India ?
option1: Claims of SCs and STs to services
explanation:
Claims of SCs and STs to Services (Article 335 in Part XVI), Instruction in mother tongue (Article 350-A in Part
XVII), Development of the Hindi Language (Article 351 in Part XVII) all are directive outside Part IV i.e., the Directive Principles.
